P2_SHUTDOWN_ERROR.errorMessage: An error occurred during system shutdown, preventing a graceful exit

P2_METRIC_EVALUATION_ERROR.errorMessage: Failed to evaluate performance metrics due to missing or invalid data

P2_TIMED_OUT_ERROR.errorMessage: The request timed out due to prolonged processing or lack of response

P2_EVALUATION_ERROR.errorMessage: An error occurred while evaluating the provided inputs or data

P2_SCHEDULED_EVALUATION_ERROR.errorMessage: An error occurred while creating scheduled evaluation
